titleStmt.title: A wonder in Kent of the admirable stomacke of one Nicholas Wood, dwelling at Harrison in the county of Kent : the like of him was neuer heard, as on this ditty is declar'd : to the tune of, The maunding souldier / R.C.
titleStmt.author: R. C.

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
